                                               {
                const G4LogicalVolume* vol = aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex();
                if (volumes_.find(vol->GetName()) != volumes_.end()) {
                    return volumeSave_[vol->GetName()];
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
